code: import"./HotelCard.css";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useWishlist}from"../../context/wishlist-context";import{findHotelInWishlist}from"../../utils/find-hotel-in-wishlist";import{useAuth}from"../../context/auth-context";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const HotelCard=_ref=>{let{hotel}=_ref;const{_id,name,image,address,state,rating,price}=hotel;const navigate=useNavigate();const{wishlistDispatch,wishlist}=useWishlist();const{accessToken,authDispatch}=useAuth();console.log({accessToken});const handleHotelCardClick=()=>{navigate("/hotels/".concat(name,"/").concat(address,"-").concat(state,"/").concat(_id,"/reserve"));};const isHotelInWishlist=findHotelInWishlist(wishlist,_id);const handleWishlistClick=()=>{if(accessToken){if(!isHotelInWishlist){wishlistDispatch({type:"ADD_TO_WISHLIST",payload:hotel});navigate("/wishlist");}else{wishlistDispatch({type:"REMOVE_FROM_WISHLIST",payload:_id});}}else{authDispatch({type:"SHOW_AUTH_MODAL"});}};console.log({wishlist});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative hotelcard-container shadow cursor-pointer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:handleHotelCardClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img",src:image,alt:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hotelcard-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"location",children:[address,", ",state]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"rating d-flex align-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{class:"material-icons-outlined",children:"star"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:rating})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"hotel-name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"price",children:["Rs. ",price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"night"})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button btn-wishlist absolute d-flex align-center",onClick:handleWishlistClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-icons favorite cursor ".concat(isHotelInWishlist?"fav-selected":""),children:"favorite"})})]});};
